typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['orders/**']) ~> Orders
source(output(
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		COMPANYNAM as string,
		CONTACTNAM as string,
		CONTACTTIT as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		REGION as string,
		POSTALCODE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		PHONE as string,
		FAX as string,
		{_NULLFLAGS} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['customers/customers.parquet']) ~> Customers
Select1, CustomersClean join(Select1@CUSTOMERID == Customers@CUSTOMERID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Orders derive(ORDERID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		ORDERID,
		CUSTOMERID,
		SHIPNAME,
		SHIPADDRES,
		SHIPCITY,
		SHIPPOSTAL,
		SHIPCOUNTR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Customers select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMERID,
		COMPANYNAM,
		CONTACTNAM,
		CONTACTTIT,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		POSTALCODE,
		COUNTRY,
		PHONE,
		FAX
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomersClean
Join1 sink(input(
		ORDERID as string,
		CUSTOMERID as string,
		EMPLOYEEID as string,
		ORDERDATE as string,
		REQUIREDDA as string,
		SHIPPEDDAT as string,
		SHIPVIA as string,
		FREIGHT as string,
		SHIPNAME as string,
		SHIPADDRES as string,
		SHIPCITY as string,
		SHIPREGION as string,
		SHIPPOSTAL as string,
		SHIPCOUNTR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
